title: In Honor of 4/20, a Magical Edible Recipe: Herb-Roasted Cashews - video Dailymotion
description: The Green Fairy, an expert at herb-infused baking, shares an easy recipe for one of her favorite 4/20-worthy snacks. “These cashews are relatively simple and quick, and both sweet and savory and high in protein,” she says. “The flavor is fresh, well-balanced and extremely addicting.” See how it all comes together here. Filmed by Andrew Rothschild
text: In Honor of 4/20, a Magical Edible Recipe: Herb-Roasted Cashews - video Dailymotion Font
